attributes.action: Health and Safety Myth of the Month
attributes.additional_details:
Re-introduce the HSE campaign 'Myth of the Month' to help dismiss some of the rubbish blamed on health and safety.
This may help reduce some of the e-petions on here calling for things to be repealed that were never banned i.e the imaginary ban on ladders
It could also be referenced by ministers to stop them embarrasing themselves when discussing the subject in parliament
